title: 8 Medicinal Plants You Need to Add to Your Garden This Year
itunes:title: 8 Medicinal Plants You Need to Add to Your Garden This Year
description: 8 medicinal plants you need to add to your garden this year, not only are these some of my favorite power house medicines on the homestead, but they're beautiful to grow just for appearances. Learn their medicinal properties, best growing practices, and how we use them in our natural medicine cabinet. Grab resources, links, and full blog post at https://melissaknorris.com/167
